newsitem.title: USA: PCA to acquire American Studios.
newsitem.headline: PCA to acquire American Studios.

text.p: PCA International Inc said it has a nonbinding letter of intent to acquire American Studios Inc for $2.50 per share in cash, subject to the approval by the boards of both companies.
The total purchase price for the 21.4 million shares of American Studios outstanding, plus assumption of debt and capital lease obligations, is about $66 million.
Consummation of the transaction is subject to execution of a definitive agreement and regulatory clearances and conditions.
American Studios provides portrait photography services in about 2,000 Wal-Mart stores in the U.S. and Mexico.
